title: On Me
lyrics:
Off the dribble, you know what I'm sayin'?
Big Fiji waters and shit
Nigga I'm on, nigga on me
Brand new pose, nigga on me
Brand new hoes, nigga on me

Brand new shows, nigga on me

Nigga off top, nigga on me

Serve another knot, nigga on me

Smokin' on the chop, nigga on me

Nigga on me, nigga on me

Nigga I'm on, nigga on me

Brand new pose, nigga on me

Brand new hoes, nigga on me

Brand new shows, nigga on me

Nigga off top, nigga on me

Serve another knot, nigga on me

Smokin' on the chop, nigga on me

Nigga on me, nigga on me



I feel John Madden

I'm pimpin', no cattin'

I'm lookin' for an Ashtyn

You nibblin' on pennies

Damnit I'm that nigga (goddamn)

Bitch I'm hella clean (sock it to me)

Goddamn (ayy ayy ayy, ayy ayy ayy)

I heard them niggas snitchin', had to hide the biscuit

Tuck the ammunition, everything efficient

Made the right choice, life's about decisions

Bought the bitch a hemi, you don't really hear me

Getting Jew like Jimmy, no gimmick

Butterfly crab legs, no lemon

Bitch talkin' 'bout kids then I'm dippin'

The neck was pretty lit but that's about it

Nekc in the house, neck in the whip

Neck in the kitchen, neck on the film

Neck on the first, neck on the sixth

Damn I never had no neck like this

Smokin' while I'm drivin', ticket for the tint, goddamn

Hopped in the whip, knocked another bitch, ooh-wee



Nigga I'm on, nigga on me

Nigga on me, nigga on me



You pillow-talking to these bitches, need to stop it

On my way to Guatamala with my shottas

Dope dealers, killers, I was raised by 'em

Project nigga, never had a job

Free my niggas, fuck them niggas droppin' dimes

Fuck a -- bitch on Twitter tellin' lies

Fuckin' for some clout, bitch you out of line

Hit it from the back, grab that bitch a towel

I didn't think about it, I just got it now

Building cases, feds at the funeral

I got whips I ain't drove in awhile

Bought in cash case the trap slowed down

Got a couple hundred but I need a mill

Spot in Hollywood, one in Morgan Hills

Bitch you actin' funny, must be on the pill

Paris Hilton vodka, sodas on chill
